data.title: Multicolor and near-infrared electroluminescence from the light-emitting devices with rare-earth doped TiO2 films
data.meta_description: We report on multicolor and near-infrared electroluminescence (EL) from the devices using rare-earth doped TiO2 (TiO2:RE) films as light-emitting layers, which
